name: Smash-a-rona
description:
To play: grab the 'meds' and drag to smash the viruses.

This is an Art-Protest game. Currently a work-in-progress.

Watch out for the orange blob in level 4. It will shrink the 'meds' away.  Still working on more levels, so I hope you have fun with these.

This game wouldn't be possible with out my Chief Game Advisor:  S. Chapin.
